content: Is there are list of patient identifier systems? I'm looking for an existing system for different provinces in canada
Short answer: yes. Whole project happening to manage these. Ask on #canada

Is there are list of patient identifier systems? I'm looking for an existing system for different provinces in canada

@Jeremy Chapman , I agree with Lloyd that Canada related discussions should happen on the #canada stream. To answer your question, please have a look at https://simplifier.net/canadianuriregistry/~resources?category=NamingSystem. You are also welcome to join any of the Canadian FHIR calls (see a list of all calls at https://infocentral.infoway-inforoute.ca/en/news-events/event-calendar)
